about-intro: Learn more about Currus Connect, your trusted partner in automotive parts and accessories.
about-text-two: - your trusted source for motor vehicle parts and accessories.
about-text-three: With over 30 years of experience with used spare parts, Currus-Connect has a unique expertise in this area.
about-text-four: With a base in Copenhagen, Denmark, Currus-Connect has an extensive network of Scandinavian car recyclers and therefore access to millions of used spare parts.
about-text-five: All spare parts are described in detail, information about chassis number, spare part number and more makes it easy for the customer to find the right spare part.
about-text-six: If in doubt, Currus-Connect will be happy to help. The customer service speaks German, Danish, English, Norwegian and Swedish.
about-text-seven: All spare parts are sold with a guarantee for functionality. We look forward to being able to help you further.
about-text-eight: You can reach us via our danish phone number (+45) 77 34 38 77
about-text-nine: Or through our german phone number (+49) 05 14 47 45 99 81
faq-intro: This is the FAQ page. Here you can find a list of frequently asked questions. Not finding what your looking for?
faq-files-intro: Here you can find further information on our policies regarding the use of cookies, the right of withdrawal, GDPR, and the terms and conditions of sale and delivery in the form of PDF files.
faq-cookies: Currus Connect uses cookies on all of the companyâ€™s websites.

contact-asap: And we will get back to you as soon as possible
contact-before: Before you contact us please check if there is already an answer to your question in our
search-result-missing-parts: Some parts might not be shown on the website. You can always contact us to make sure if we have the part.
